about_the_game:
A fast paced party shooter where the goal is to get the most points and win the final round!

Play mini-games to gain points and spend them all in the final round in order to become the champion of the arena!
detailed_description:
A fast paced party shooter where the goal is to get the most points and win the final round!

Play mini-games to gain points and spend them all in the final round in order to become the champion of the arena!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8250U CPU @ 1.60GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: Any Non-Intel Integrated Graphics.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Does it work?
  • Additional Notes: See Windows Requirements.

name: Project RBG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32 Bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8250U CPU @ 1.60GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: Any Non-Intel Integrated Graphics.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Does it work?
  • Additional Notes: I'm going to be honest and say that these are guesses or whatever lowest quality thing that the dev team has that can still run the game. There will (probably and hopefully) be a special build for players with Intel integrated graphics.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10750H CPU @ 2.60GHz 2.59 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 Super
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: I'm just putting what I use here - GamEsnitzhel [Programmer]

short_description: A fast paced FPS party game. Each round is a different minigame. Collect points to buy upgrades and destroy your friends in The Final Round. Last one standing takes the cake!
